title: Tadej Pogačar Isn’t The Fastest Person in Yellow at the Tour de France: Meet Claire Pedrono, the Tour’s Blackboard Official
content:
Behind the scenes with Pedrono in her time-honored, fast-paced role of ardoisière, showing the time gaps to the peloton and breakaway, using chalk and a blackboard.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar Isn’t The Fastest Person in Yellow at the Tour de France: Meet Claire Pedrono, the Tour’s Blackboard Official on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
